description: This file declares utility functions for D-Bus interactions related to the LED Manager, including daemonization and command dispatch functionalities.

methods.name: daemonize
methods.description: Puts the LED Manager thread in the background, running it as a daemon while the main process remains in the foreground.

methods.name: cmd_dispatch
methods.description: Dispatches SSP commands for creating, engaging, or canceling operations related to the LED Manager.
